name: Toadking
short_description:
Toadking is an app for Android phones. 

Toadking lets you enter data for markers and share this data

Use Toadking for keeping track of your health, and sending this data to your doctor or nurse. He or she can then view the data as image charts or import the data in excel. Entering and sharing data is quick and easy.

The typical usage scenario goes like this:

1.    You and your doctor or nurse agree up on some "markers" to track. You then setup these markers.

2.    You agree upon how often you should email the marker data to your nurse or doctor (probably monthly), if you should email it as text data or chart images, and to what email address you should send it to.

3.    You enter data for the markers every day or as often as you can

4.    You email the data to your nurse or doctor as agreed

5.    Your doctor or nurse views the data.
summary: An android app for keeping track of your health
